00021 void TcpClient::ConnectToServer(const SimpleString addr, int port)
00022 {
00023   MsgSocket::InitForTcpClient(addr, port);
00024
00025   MsgSocket::StartThread();
00026   MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg();
00027 }

00029 int TcpClient::SendToServer(int len, const char* buffer)
00030 {
00031   return MsgSocket::Send(len, buffer);
00032 }

00034 void TcpClient::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00035 {
00036     // Check validity of a service Id
00037     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00038     {
00039         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00040 #ifdef DEBUG
00041 //        fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for TcpClient. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00042 #endif
00043     }
00044     MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid);
00045 }

00062 int TcpClient::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& listId)
00063 {
00064   unsigned int pid = MsgSocket::GetPeerPid();
00065   if(pid != 0)
00066     {
00067       listId.Add(pid);
00068       return 1;
00069     }
00070   return 0;
00071 }
